title: Build Cosmata premium skincare e-commerce website

requirements.text: Create a sticky header with Cosmata logo on the left, navigation menu (Home, Shop, About, Blog, Contact), and icon group on the right (search, account, cart). Use soft beige (#F5EFE8), white, and subtle gold accents (#C9A96E). Implement sticky scroll behavior.

quotes: Sticky Header: Logo on left (Cosmata), Menu: Home, Shop, About, Blog, Contact, Search icon, Account icon, Cart icon

acceptanceCriteria: Header remains fixed at top during scroll
Navigation links are clickable and functional
Search, account, and cart icons are visible and interactive
Color scheme matches brand palette: beige #F5EFE8, white, gold #C9A96E

requirements.text: Build hero section with left-aligned text: headline 'Glow Naturally. Clinically Proven.', subtext 'Reveal your healthiest skin with Cosmata's science-backed skincare solutions.', primary CTA 'Shop Now', and secondary CTA 'Explore Collection'. Right side displays premium product image. Use modern serif font for headings and clean sans-serif for body text.

quotes: Headline: 'Glow Naturally. Clinically Proven.', Subtext: 'Reveal your healthiest skin with Cosmata's science-backed skincare solutions.', Primary CTA button: Shop Now, Secondary CTA button: Explore Collection

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section spans full viewport width
Text content matches exactly as specified
Both CTA buttons are styled distinctly (primary vs secondary)
Layout is responsive with text stacking above image on mobile
Typography uses serif for headings and sans-serif for body

requirements.text: Add trust badge section with 3 horizontally aligned icons and labels: 'Dermatologically Tested', '100% Safe Ingredients', '24/7 Customer Support'. Use minimal rounded design with soft shadows.

quotes: 3 icons horizontally: - Dermatologically Tested - 100% Safe Ingredients - 24/7 Customer Support

acceptanceCriteria: Three trust badges displayed in a horizontal row
Each badge has an icon and descriptive text
Badges are evenly spaced and centered
Responsive layout stacks badges vertically on mobile

requirements.text: Create 'Shop by Category' section with 4 category cards: Serum, Cleanser, Moisturizer, Face Wash. Each card should have minimal rounded design with elegant product imagery, using soft shadows and rounded corners.

quotes: 4 category cards: Serum, Cleanser, Moisturizer, Face Wash, Minimal rounded cards with elegant product images

acceptanceCriteria: Four category cards displayed in a grid
Each card is clickable and navigates to category page
Cards have rounded corners and soft shadows
Grid is responsive (4 columns desktop, 2 on tablet, 1 on mobile)

requirements.text: Build best sellers product grid with 4 products per row on desktop. Each product card includes: product image, product name, short benefit line, price, and 'Add to Cart' button. Add 'Best Seller' urgency tag. Implement hover effects on buttons.

quotes: Grid layout (4 products per row desktop), Each product card: Product image, Product name, Short benefit line, Price, Add to Cart button
Add urgency tag on best sellers: 'Best Seller'

acceptanceCriteria: Product grid displays 4 products per row on desktop
Each card shows all required information
'Best Seller' tag is visually prominent
Add to Cart button has hover effect
Grid is responsive (adjusts to 2 columns on tablet, 1 on mobile)
Clicking 'Add to Cart' adds product to cart state

requirements.text: Create ingredient highlight section with split layout: left side shows close-up skin texture image, right side displays benefits of Vitamin C, Kojic Acid, and Niacinamide with short scientific explanations in simple English.

quotes: Split layout: Left: Close-up skin texture image, Right: Benefits of Vitamin C, Kojic Acid, Niacinamide, Short scientific explanations in simple English

acceptanceCriteria: Section uses a two-column split layout
Left column displays skin texture image
Right column lists three ingredients with benefits
Text is clear, simple, and scientifically accurate without medical claims
Layout stacks vertically on mobile

requirements.text: Add before & after section with image comparison slider showing realistic acne-to-clear skin results. Include disclaimer text: 'Results may vary'.

quotes: Image comparison slider, Realistic acne-to-clear skin result, Add disclaimer: 'Results may vary'

acceptanceCriteria: Interactive slider allows user to compare before/after images
Images show realistic skin improvement
Disclaimer 'Results may vary' is clearly visible
Slider is touch-friendly on mobile devices

requirements.text: Build testimonials section with 3 customer review cards. Each card includes 5-star rating and short genuine review text. Use clean minimal card design with soft shadows.

quotes: 3 customer review cards, 5-star ratings, Short genuine review text

acceptanceCriteria: Three testimonial cards displayed horizontally
Each card shows star rating (5 stars)
Review text is concise and readable
Cards use minimal design with soft shadows
Layout is responsive (stacks vertically on mobile)

requirements.text: Create blog preview section with 3 skincare tips article cards. Use clean minimal card design consistent with site aesthetic.

quotes: 3 skincare tips articles preview, Clean minimal cards

acceptanceCriteria: Three blog article preview cards displayed
Each card includes article title and excerpt
Cards are clickable and link to full articles
Design matches minimal aesthetic with rounded corners
Responsive layout (3 columns desktop, 1 column mobile)

requirements.text: Build footer with newsletter signup form, quick links section, social media icons, contact details, and secure payment icons. Use brand color palette and maintain premium minimal aesthetic.

quotes: Newsletter signup, Quick links, Social icons, Contact details, Secure payment icons

acceptanceCriteria: Newsletter signup has email input field and submit button
Quick links include all main navigation items
Social media icons are visible and link to platforms
Contact information is clearly displayed
Payment icons (Visa, Mastercard, etc.) are shown
Footer layout is organized and responsive

requirements.text: Implement cart functionality: users can add products to cart, view cart contents, update quantities, and proceed to checkout. Store cart state globally.
acceptanceCriteria: Add to Cart button adds product to cart state
Cart icon shows item count badge
Cart page displays all added products
Users can update product quantities or remove items
Cart persists across page navigation
Checkout button navigates to checkout flow

requirements.text: Ensure fully responsive design with mobile-first optimization. Implement smooth scroll behavior and hover effects on all interactive elements (buttons, cards, links).

quotes: Fully responsive design, Mobile-first optimization, Smooth scroll, Hover effects on buttons

acceptanceCriteria: All sections render correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop
Mobile layout prioritizes vertical stacking and readability
Smooth scroll is enabled for anchor links
Buttons and interactive elements have visible hover states
Touch targets are appropriately sized for mobile (minimum 44px)

requirements.text: Create backend product catalog with at least 8 sample products across 4 categories (Serum, Cleanser, Moisturizer, Face Wash). Each product includes: name, category, benefit description, price, image reference, and isBestSeller flag.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores product data with all required fields
Products are organized by category
At least 2 products per category
Best seller flags are set for featured products
Frontend can query and display all products

requirements.text: Apply consistent brand design system throughout: soft beige (#F5EFE8) backgrounds, white content areas, subtle gold accents (#C9A96E), rounded corners, soft shadows, strong white space, and premium minimal aesthetic. Use modern serif font for headings and clean sans-serif for body text.

quotes: Use soft beige (#F5EFE8), white, and subtle gold accents (#C9A96E)
Clean layout with strong white space
Modern serif font for headings and clean sans-serif for body text

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette is consistently applied: beige #F5EFE8, white, gold #C9A96E
Typography hierarchy uses serif for headings, sans-serif for body
All components use rounded corners and soft shadows
White space is generous and layout feels uncluttered
Overall aesthetic feels premium, clinical, and minimal

constraints: Use only Motoko for backend logic in a single-actor architecture
Frontend must use React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts/tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui
Avoid medical claims; keep product descriptions scientifically accurate but simple
Maintain premium, minimal, clinical aesthetic throughout
nonGoals: Integration with third-party payment processors (use placeholder checkout)
Blog content management system (use static sample articles)
Email newsletter backend integration (placeholder signup form)
Advanced search and filtering (basic category filtering is sufficient)
User account creation and order history

Minimal cleanser bottle product image on white background with soft shadow (product-cleanser.dim_400x400.png)
Minimal moisturizer jar product image on white background with soft shadow (product-moisturizer.dim_400x400.png)
